channel.title: WTF... Help Please
channel.description:
why on my server of any other servers....
My servers running smoothly for about a minute.. then I start to experience a insane lag thats not even funny, I dont know if it happens to the other people but it happens to me... and also
Why is it peoples profiles get randomly Reset this is EXTREAMLY annoying
It auto saves, and say my friend plays on my server for 5 days, he helps me with stuff but one server restart makes all his stuff go away, Only him, and this happens to random people at random times when i retstart, WTF is causing this, I have 2 auto savers I think AND a auto save when crash. WHAT THE HELL IS CAUSING THIS, somone please help me.

item.title: WTF... Help Please
item.dc:creator: @eunicedude eunicedude
item.description:
@eunicedude wrote:

[quote=“Wolfeyes217, post:13, topic:7220”][quote author=eunicedude link=topic=10063.msg114473#msg114473 date=1154478440]

How is attacking a shop keeping difrent from attacking any other npcs?

other npcs have no hp…
[/quote]

On cheez 78 If there hp is at 0 it automaticaly puts it at something random[/quote]
but it seems that we lag after an npc dies tho…

Read full topic

Hey wolfy. I’v heard the lag becoz the Friend list in other servers
try to Disable the friend list becoz, who the hell using it

item.title: WTF... Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Azn_Pride Azn_Pride
item.description:
@Azn_Pride wrote:

Wolf, you said you were disk defragmenting right? Hmm… And disk defragment moves files around to organize it. So maybe, while you were defragmenting. Some files were moved and/or deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: WTF... Help Please
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

It could just be your host wearing down. Even servers on a good host lag. Did you try setting your timer down a little? The resets would be a little annoying but sounds like the lag is worse. And I have no clue why your accounts are resetting.

Read full topic

Read full topic
